body: Someone got an Minecon cape account or code that you ain't need, tell me bellow.
body_tagged: Someone got an Minecon cape account or code that you ain't need, tell me bellow.
title: Minecon Cape

replies.body:
Hey Last! 

"Discussions surrounding personal updates is frowned upon as they are meant to be inclusive rather than oriented around a single person. "

This may not be a personal update but it still is only oriented around you :) I would recommend asking people over skype instead of over the forums since it does create a bit of spam on the forums and could get a few people jealous if they see a friend of theirs giving a Minecon cape to you and not them :)

Hope you have a nice day and good luck on your search of a Minecon cape!

Locking...
